What? Really? Well that shouldn't happen either. Gah. Why do there have to be soooo maaaany moooods.

I figured out what the problem was for KAS; have to set up the file like this: and it works fine.

NORMAL_LIST

{

}

OVERRIDES

{

}

Oddly, this doesn't work for 6C, the game will load, but not the parts.

EDIT: Fixed that too.. typo in filename ::feels like idiot::

Edited January 7, 2014 by Bloodbunny
So this sounds like an issue specific to 2-9, as I did not have to do that when I installed 2-8...
Looks like v9 also causes asmi's ECLSS Oxygen and CO2 tanks to not load, along with 6S and KAS.

So this sounds like an issue specific to 2-9, as I did not have to do that when I installed 2-8...

Yeah, I have an idea of what is going on, but I won't be able to upload a new version until I get home today.

For what it's worth, adding blank configs for both KSPX and HullCameraVDS solved my problems -- and introduced others. Now the 6S Service Compartment Tubes aren't loading!

Incredible mod though. I'm now up to a full gigabyte of memory savings and I still haven't added in a few of my mods yet. Dare I hope to be able to run all of my preferred mods plus B9 in under 2GB of memory? Oh, I can dream.

The improvement in my water lag problem is incredible too. Water lag has all but disappeared for me unless I'm looking directly at the ocean now. Which implies to me that Squad could solve the water lag problem if they really wanted to. Grumble, grumble, gripe, gripe.
Yay the new update fixed all the shiney errors! Thanks rbay!

Just add a blank config for the 6C stuff and it too will load without problems

Just a heads up, the new version 2-9 seems to cause the scoop-o-matics from the mod Beastly Science to not load.

Just thought you wouldn't like to know.

The new version has serious issues loading anything that's not explicitly defined in a configuration file. It deleted my RemoteTech dishes and single highhandedly wiped out my entire communications network. Luckily I had backups.

Anyway, version 8 doesn't seem to have that issue for some reason.

Everyone should have backups for this reason alone. Updates can cause issues, smart move on your part.

What? How? Do ships permanently disappear if parts can't load due to textures? , I have a fix in the works, just have to get home to upload it. I'll have to post a warning on the OP for now.

What? How? Do ships permanently disappear if parts can't load due to textures? , I have a fix in the works, just have to get home to upload it. I'll have to post a warning on the OP for now.

If a model, part, or texture is missing and you load a vessel they usually disappear yes.
